endpoints: (4) Non-GAAP Adjustments to EBITDA for the fourth quarter of 2019 include the following pre-tax adjustments: $0.2 million related to the settlement of the Company's U.S. defined benefit pension plan, and $(102.3) million related to the eOne Acquisition. Non-GAAP Adjustments to EBITDA for full year 2019 include the following pre-tax adjustments: $111.0 million related to the settlement of the Company's U.S. defined benefit pension plan, and $(76.8) million related to the eOne Acquisition. Refer to the notes to the Reconciliation of Net Earnings and Earnings per Share table above for additional details.
